```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
data("Titanic") # load the pre-installed titanic dataset
data.titanic <- Titanic %>% as_tibble()

glimpse(data.titanic)
```

```{r}
data.titanic %<>% select(Class,Sex,Age,Survived) # select only the variables we want
data.titanic <- map(data.titanic,as.factor) # turn all variables into factors
data.titanic$Survived %<>% as.numeric()
```

# Prediction

```{r}
titanic.fit <- lm(Survived~Class+Sex+Age, data = data.titanic)
pred <- predict(titanic.fit)

```
